successes.title: Cyberith Virtualizer - Immersive Virtual Reality Gaming
successes.description: Full Immersion. No Restrictions. The next level of Virtual Reality is here.

Pledges.description:
SPECIAL THANKS :
Thank you for supporting our project. You should know that, from now on, you’ll always be deep in our hearts. As a token of our Austrian love we offer you an exclusive audio recording of one of our CEOs, yelling at you “to get to se chooopaa”. Plus, we will keep you informed about all the updates regarding our campaign and the Virtualizer in general.

STRESS MANAGEMENT : Support the Cyberith team and help us finance Tuncay’s daily dosage of Red Bull. Why, you may ask? Imagine that bearded beast of a man being your boss. Now imagine him weary, tired and in serious need of caffeine. And now let your empathy do the rest.

ANOTHER BRICK IN THE WALL : Without your help all of this wouldn't be possible, so it is only fitting for us to be reminded of all our lovely supporters on a daily basis. That's why we decided to put a fine piece of art in our office with your name and an additional message of your choosing (up to 80 characters) engraved. We'd prefer philosophy but will live with profanity as well.
SHIRT & POSTER BUNDLE : A limited edition t-shirt and a signed poster for the Virtualizer, only available via Kickstarter. See the project description for a preview!
VIRTUALIZER POWERBANK : Get a customized Virtualizer Powerbank to make sure your phone never runs out of battery again! See the project description for a preview!

POWERBANK & SHIRT & POSTER BUNDLE : Get a customized Virtualizer Powerbank, plus a limited edition t-shirt and a signed poster for the Virtualizer, only available via Kickstarter. See the project description for a preview!
VIRTUALIZER WITHOUT SENSORS :

This version of the Virtualizer has no built-in sensors and is specifically targeted at developers and researchers who want to track movement with/via different sensor solutions like optical tracking or the PrioVR Suit from YEI Technology. Keep in mind that this stripped-down version is NOT a fully functional device without an additional tracking system. For the real deal, check out the next pledges!
(add $79 for "The Arm"; see product description!) (shipping costs and tax separate; see FAQ)

VIRTUALIZER EARLY BIRD : The first 150 backers will receive the Virtualizer for a special price. Additionally, your name will be registered in our hall of fame of virtual reality pioneers. Prepare yourself for full immersion and mobility in virtual environments!
(add $79 for "The Arm"; see product description!) (shipping costs and tax separate; see FAQ)

VIRTUALIZER STANDARD :  Fully functional Virtualizer! Prepare yourself for full immersion and mobility in virtual environments!(add $79 for "The Arm"; see product description!) (shipping costs and tax separate; see FAQ)

VIRTUALIZER STANDARD [FULL PACKAGE] : Get the Virtualizer plus a customized Virtualizer Powerbank. Also includes a limited edition t-shirt and a signed poster for the Virtualizer. Prepare yourself for full immersion and mobility in virtual environments!
(add $79 for "The Arm"; see product description!) (shipping costs and tax separate; see FAQ)

VIRTUALIZER HT [EARLY BIRD] : The first 150 backers will receive the Virtualizer for a special price. This Virtualizer comes with added tactile feedback for maximum immersion. Feel bombs detonating beside you as you experience your favorite game like never before!
(add $79 for "The Arm"; see product description!) (shipping costs and tax separate; see FAQ)

VIRTUALIZER HT : This Virtualizer comes with added tactile feedback for maximum immersion. Feel bombs detonating beside you as you experience your favorite game like never before! (add $79 for "The Arm"; see product description!) (shipping costs and tax separate; see FAQ)

VIRTUALIZER HT [FULL PACKAGE] : This Virtualizer comes with added tactile feedback for maximum immersion. Also included: a customized Virtualizer Powerbank, a limited edition T-shirt and a signed poster. Feel bombs detonating beside you as you experience your favorite game like you never did before! Prepare yourself for full immersion and mobility in virtual environments!
(add $79 for "The Arm"; see product description!) (shipping costs and tax separate; see FAQ)

PERSONALIZED VIRTUALIZER : Promote your brand or personalize your Virtualizer by customizing the base-plate design. Send us a logo, icon or picture and we will print it on the plate, giving your Virtualizer a personal note.
(add $79 for "The Arm"; see product description!) (shipping costs and tax  separate; see FAQ)
